name: Genius! NAZI-GIRL GoePPels-Chan ep2
description:
This is a slightly different history to the world we know.
An anti-war visual novel parody set in 1930s Germany where you play Goeppels-chan, the Minister of Propaganda, and have to keep the Fuhrer happy.

This time, the Fuhrer has ordered the production of a propaganda cartoon.
Please guide Goeppels-chan, who knows nothing about animation, through her distress and on to a good ending.
There's also a Super Good Ending and a Worst Ending available

Direction/Writing
Nao Minda

Illustration
Kiichi

Voice actors
Geli Goeppels/Gumi Kinoshita
